title: "This is it. We're here."
body:
*Having the gathered champions from across the lands to aid her exedition, after a long journey the four adventurers manage to reach the fabled moon temple.*

{{champion:267}} Behind these temple doors are what we've all gathered here for. The temple of the moon. 
{{champion:41}} Yeah yeah, I don't really care. Long as I get me share of the riches.
{{champion:81}} So... this is it. We're finally here. The temple of the moon. I'm getting shivers just thinking about what mystical artifacts might exist within.
{{champion:254}} I'll open the temple doors.

*Loud crash as the temple doors collapse, smoke slowly clears*

*Inside is a large, bright orange room, filled with posters of an iron knight with a icon of the sun on his armor*

{{champion:89}} Oh. Hi guys. You could have... knocked.

{{champion:267}} I don't understand. This is supposed to be the ancient temple of the moon.
{{champion:41}} There be no booty here! Well, the monetary kind, anyways.
{{champion:89}} ...
{{champion:81}} This is lame. I'm going home.

*Vi, Gangplank, and Ezreal collectively grumble as they leave*

{{champion:131}} Leona when are you gonna pay the re- WHAT HAPPENED TO THE DOOR.
{{champion:267}} I... I thought this was supposed to be the moon temple.
{{champion:131}} It is. I'm renting it out to leona... among other services.
{{champion:267}} I didn't need to know that second part. B-b-but if this the temple, where's the moonstone?
{{champion:131}} I dunno. Some riot employees took it last week. They're probably retconning your lore.
{{champion:267}} What's a... retcon?
{{champion:89}} Go ask Sivir or something.

*Nami hurriedly runs off, Then hears the cuddling of Leona and Diana and decides to run even faster*

*Somewhere inside a overly-air conditioned office*
{{champion:111}} Morello.
{{champion:34}} What is it, Ghostcrawler?
{{champion:111}} She's onto us. She might be able to undo the retcon.
{{champion:34}} No... Let her go, for now. I will have some fun with this one.
{{champion:111}} As you desire, sir.
